docs.snippet: Six Canadian citizens were killed when gunmen stormed a hotel in the capital city of Burkina Faso on Friday, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Six Canadian citizens were killed when gunmen stormed a hotel in the capital city of Burkina Faso on Friday, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said on Saturday.

headline.main: Six Canadians Killed in Burkina Faso Attack, PM Trudeau Says
headline.print_headline: Six Canadians Killed in Burkina Faso Attack, PM Trudeau Says

docs.snippet: The scholars were among more than 1,000 people who signed a public statement urging the government to end the “deliberate massacre” of Kurds....
docs.lead_paragraph: The scholars were among more than 1,000 people who signed a public statement urging the government to end the “deliberate massacre” of Kurds.

docs.snippet: Actor Cuba Gooding, Jr., who portrays O.J. Simpson in FX's 10-part miniseries on the 1995 murder trial, said he didn't want to meet the former football star as part of his research for taking on the role....
docs.lead_paragraph: Actor Cuba Gooding, Jr., who portrays O.J. Simpson in FX's 10-part miniseries on the 1995 murder trial, said he didn't want to meet the former football star as part of his research for taking on the role.

headline.main: Gooding Said He Didn't Want to Meet With O.J. Simpson
headline.print_headline: Gooding Said He Didn't Want to Meet With O.J. Simpson

docs.snippet: The first glimpse of a secretly negotiated U.S.-Iran prisoner exchange came on Saturday in a flurry of early morning electronic filings in federal courts from New York to California as prosecutors dropped sanctions violations cases against more th...
docs.lead_paragraph: The first glimpse of a secretly negotiated U.S.-Iran prisoner exchange came on Saturday in a flurry of early morning electronic filings in federal courts from New York to California as prosecutors dropped sanctions violations cases against more than half a dozen Iranians.

headline.main: How U.S.-Iran Prisoner Swap Drama Unfolded in Fits and Starts
headline.print_headline: How U.S.-Iran Prisoner Swap Drama Unfolded in Fits and Starts

docs.snippet: They are brazen, terse, edgy and carry king-size ambition through a city of extremes. On Friday, the residents took exception to Senator Ted Cruz’s recent remarks about “New York values.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: They are brazen, terse, edgy and carry king-size ambition through a city of extremes. On Friday, the residents took exception to Senator Ted Cruz’s recent remarks about “New York values.”
docs.abstract: New Yorkers, from city residents to media sources, respond clearly to Senator Ted Cruz's use of phrase 'New York values' as pejorative against Donald Trump during Republican presidential debate.

headline.main: New Yorkers, Self-Assured and Opinionated, Defend Their Values
headline.print_headline: New Yorkers, Fiery and Curt, Defend Values

byline.contributor: Noah Remnick, Rick Rojas and Marc Santora contributed reporting.
